test_cases.title: Successful login using valid username
test_cases.preconditions: A registered account exists with a valid username and password
steps: Enter a valid username into the username field
Enter the correct password into the password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the account dashboard

test_cases.title: Successful login using valid email address
test_cases.preconditions: A registered account exists with a valid email and password
steps: Enter a valid email address into the username field
Enter the correct password into the password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the account dashboard

test_cases.title: Login failure with unregistered username
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Enter a non-existent username into the username field
Enter any password into the password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed and both input fields remain populated with the entered values

test_cases.title: Login failure with incorrect password
test_cases.preconditions: A registered account exists
steps: Enter a valid username into the username field
Enter an incorrect password into the password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed and both input fields remain populated with the entered values

test_cases.title: Login recovery after authentication error
test_cases.preconditions: A registered account exists
steps: Enter a valid username into the username field
Enter an incorrect password into the password field
Click the Log In button
Clear the password field and enter the correct password
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the account dashboard after the second login attempt

test_cases.title: Login attempt with empty credentials
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the username field empty
Leave the password field empty
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that credentials do not match or are required

test_cases.title: Login with special characters in username
test_cases.preconditions: An account exists with special characters in the username
steps: Enter the username containing special characters into the username field
Enter the correct password into the password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the account dashboard

test_cases.title: Successful customer lookup with valid details
test_cases.preconditions: A valid user record exists in the system matching the input criteria
steps: Enter a valid First Name into the First Name field
Enter a valid Last Name into the Last Name field
Enter a valid Address into the Address field
Enter a valid City into the City field
Select a valid State from the State dropdown
Enter a valid Zip Code into the Zip Code field
Enter a valid SSN into the SSN field
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The page displays the appropriate recovery details for the matching record

test_cases.title: Error message displayed when no matching record is found
test_cases.preconditions: No user record exists in the system matching the input criteria
steps: Enter 'NonExistent' into the First Name field
Enter 'User' into the Last Name field
Enter '999 Unknown St' into the Address field
Enter 'Nowhere' into the City field
Select a State from the State dropdown
Enter '00000' into the Zip Code field
Enter '000-00-0000' into the SSN field
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The page displays an error message indicating no matching record was found

test_cases.title: Validation error when First Name is left blank
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the First Name field empty
Fill in all other required fields with valid data
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is prompted to complete the First Name field before the form can be submitted

test_cases.title: Validation error when Last Name is left blank
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the Last Name field empty
Fill in all other required fields with valid data
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is prompted to complete the Last Name field before the form can be submitted

test_cases.title: Validation error when Address is left blank
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the Address field empty
Fill in all other required fields with valid data
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is prompted to complete the Address field before the form can be submitted

test_cases.title: Validation error when City is left blank
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the City field empty
Fill in all other required fields with valid data
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is prompted to complete the City field before the form can be submitted

test_cases.title: Validation error when Zip Code is left blank
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the Zip Code field empty
Fill in all other required fields with valid data
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is prompted to complete the Zip Code field before the form can be submitted

test_cases.title: Validation error when SSN is left blank
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the SSN field empty
Fill in all other required fields with valid data
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is prompted to complete the SSN field before the form can be submitted

test_cases.title: Successful lookup with hyphenated Last Name and special characters in Address
test_cases.preconditions: A user record exists with a hyphenated last name and an apartment number in the address
steps: Enter 'Jane' into the First Name field
Enter 'Smith-Doe' into the Last Name field
Enter '123 Main St. #4B' into the Address field
Enter 'New York' into the City field
Select 'NY' from the State dropdown
Enter '10001' into the Zip Code field
Enter a valid SSN into the SSN field
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The page successfully matches the record and displays the recovery details

test_cases.title: Successful login with valid credentials
test_cases.preconditions: User has an existing account with valid username and password
steps: Enter a valid username into the Username field
Enter the corresponding valid password into the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is successfully authenticated and granted access to their account.

test_cases.title: Successful account registration with all valid fields
test_cases.preconditions: The registration form is loaded and empty
steps: Enter 'John' into the First Name field
Enter 'Doe' into the Last Name field
Enter '123 Maple St' into the Address field
Enter 'Springfield' into the City field
Enter 'IL' into the State field
Enter '62704' into the Zip Code field
Enter '555-0199' into the Phone # field
Enter '999-00-1234' into the SSN field
Enter 'johndoe_test' into the Username field
Enter 'Password123!' into the Password field
Enter 'Password123!' into the Confirm Password field
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The account is created and the user is automatically logged into the system

test_cases.title: Login failure with invalid username
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Enter a non-existent username into the Username field
Enter any password into the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The system denies access and displays an authentication error message.

test_cases.title: Login failure with incorrect password
test_cases.preconditions: User has an existing account
steps: Enter a valid username into the Username field
Enter an incorrect password into the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The system denies access and displays an authentication error message.

test_cases.title: Registration failure when Password and Confirm Password do not match
test_cases.preconditions: The registration form is loaded
steps: Fill all personal information fields with valid data
Enter 'User123' into the Username field
Enter 'Secret123' into the Password field
Enter 'Different456' into the Confirm Password field
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays an error message indicating passwords do not match and does not create the account

test_cases.title: Verify Forgot login info link functionality
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Click the 'Forgot login info?' link
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the account recovery or password reset page.

test_cases.title: Verify Register link functionality
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Click the 'Register' link
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the account registration page.

test_cases.title: Login failure with empty fields
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the Username field empty
Leave the Password field empty
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The system prevents submission or displays a validation message indicating fields are required.

test_cases.title: Registration failure when mandatory First Name is empty
test_cases.preconditions: The registration form is loaded
steps: Leave the First Name field empty
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error indicating First Name is mandatory and does not create the account

test_cases.title: Registration failure when mandatory SSN is empty
test_cases.preconditions: The registration form is loaded
steps: Leave the SSN field empty
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error indicating SSN is mandatory and does not create the account

test_cases.title: Registration failure when all fields are left empty
test_cases.preconditions: The registration form is loaded
steps: Click the Register button without entering any data
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays validation errors for all mandatory fields and does not create the account

test_cases.title: Login with special characters in username
test_cases.preconditions: User has an account where the username contains special characters
steps: Enter the username containing special characters into the Username field
Enter the valid password into the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is successfully authenticated and granted access to their account.

test_cases.title: Registration with special characters in name and address fields
test_cases.preconditions: The registration form is loaded
steps: Enter 'O'Connor-Smith' into the First Name field
Enter 'Doe-Ray' into the Last Name field
Enter 'Apt #4, 50/50 St.' into the Address field
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The account is successfully created and the user is automatically logged in

test_cases.title: Registration with long alphanumeric strings in all fields
test_cases.preconditions: The registration form is loaded
steps: Enter a 50-character string into the First Name field
Enter a 50-character string into the Last Name field
Enter a 100-character string into the Address field
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The account is successfully created and the user is automatically logged in

test_cases.title: Successfully open a new Savings account with valid funding
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page with an existing account containing at least $100.00
steps: Select 'Savings' from the account type dropdown
Select an existing account from the funding source dropdown
Click the 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: A new Savings account is created with a unique account number and a $100.00 balance, deducted from the source account.

test_cases.title: Successfully open a new Checking account with valid funding
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page with an existing account containing at least $100.00
steps: Select 'Checking' from the account type dropdown
Select an existing account from the funding source dropdown
Click the 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: A new Checking account is created with a unique account number and a $100.00 balance, deducted from the source account.

test_cases.title: Verify transaction integrity of the $100.00 opening deposit
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page with a known balance in the source account
steps: Select 'Savings' from the account type dropdown
Select an existing account from the funding source dropdown
Click the 'Open New Account' button
Navigate to the account summary or transaction history
test_cases.expected_result: The source account shows a debit of exactly $100.00 and the new account shows a credit of exactly $100.00.

test_cases.title: Attempt to open account with insufficient funds in source account
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page with an existing account containing less than $100.00
steps: Select 'Savings' from the account type dropdown
Select the existing account with insufficient funds from the funding source dropdown
Click the 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: System displays an error message indicating insufficient funds and does not create a new account.

test_cases.title: Attempt to open account without selecting a funding source
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page
steps: Select 'Checking' from the account type dropdown
Leave the funding source dropdown unselected
Click the 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: System displays a validation error requiring a funding source selection.

test_cases.title: Attempt to open account with exactly $100.00 in source account
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page with an existing account containing exactly $100.00
steps: Select 'Savings' from the account type dropdown
Select the existing account with exactly $100.00 from the funding source dropdown
Click the 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: The account is successfully created and the source account balance is reduced to $0.00.

test_cases.title: Verify Account Services sidebar links are present
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and viewing the Accounts Overview page
steps: Locate the 'Account Services' sidebar
Check for the presence of 'Open New Account' link
Check for the presence of 'Accounts Overview' link
Check for the presence of 'Transfer Funds' link
Check for the presence of 'Bill Pay' link
Check for the presence of 'Find Transactions' link
Check for the presence of 'Update Contact Info' link
Check for the presence of 'Request Loan' link
Check for the presence of 'Log Out' link
test_cases.expected_result: All specified links are visible within the Account Services sidebar

test_cases.title: Verify Accounts Overview table structure and heading
test_cases.preconditions: User has at least one active account
steps: Verify the main content area heading is 'Accounts Overview'
Locate the accounts table
Verify table headers include 'Account', 'Balance', and 'Available Amount'
test_cases.expected_result: The page displays the correct heading and a table with columns for Account, Balance, and Available Amount

test_cases.title: Verify account row data accuracy
test_cases.preconditions: User has multiple accounts with existing balances
steps: Identify each row in the accounts table
Verify each row contains a clickable Account number
Verify each row displays a Balance value
Verify each row displays an Available Amount value
test_cases.expected_result: Every account owned by the customer is listed with its specific number, balance, and available amount

test_cases.title: Verify total balance calculation
test_cases.preconditions: User has multiple accounts with varying balances
steps: Sum the values in the 'Balance' column for all account rows
Locate the 'Total' row at the bottom of the table
Compare the calculated sum with the value displayed in the Total row
test_cases.expected_result: The Total row displays the correct combined sum of all account balances

test_cases.title: Verify Accounts Overview is highlighted in sidebar
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Accounts Overview page
steps: Locate the 'Accounts Overview' link in the sidebar
Inspect the CSS properties or class of the 'Accounts Overview' link
test_cases.expected_result: The 'Accounts Overview' link is visually highlighted or marked as active compared to other sidebar links

test_cases.title: Verify display for customer with a single account
test_cases.preconditions: User has exactly one account
steps: Count the number of account rows in the table
Check the Total balance value
test_cases.expected_result: The table shows one account row and the Total balance matches that single account's balance

test_cases.title: Successful fund transfer with valid inputs
test_cases.preconditions: User has at least two accounts with available balances
steps: Enter a valid numeric value in the Amount field
Select an account from the From account number dropdown
Select a different account from the To account number dropdown
Click the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: The system processes the transaction and displays a success confirmation

test_cases.title: Transfer fails when Amount field is empty
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the Amount field empty
Select an account from the From account number dropdown
Select an account from the To account number dropdown
Click the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: The system prevents the transfer and displays a validation error for the Amount field

test_cases.title: Transfer fails when From account is not selected
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Enter a valid numeric value in the Amount field
Ensure no account is selected in the From account number dropdown
Select an account from the To account number dropdown
Click the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: The system prevents the transfer and displays a validation error for the From account selection

test_cases.title: Transfer fails when To account is not selected
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Enter a valid numeric value in the Amount field
Select an account from the From account number dropdown
Ensure no account is selected in the To account number dropdown
Click the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: The system prevents the transfer and displays a validation error for the To account selection

test_cases.title: Transfer fails with non-numeric amount input
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Enter 'ABC' in the Amount field
Select an account from the From account number dropdown
Select an account from the To account number dropdown
Click the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: The system prevents the transfer and displays an invalid format error for the Amount field

test_cases.title: Transfer with minimum valid amount
test_cases.preconditions: User has at least two accounts with available balances
steps: Enter '0.01' in the Amount field
Select an account from the From account number dropdown
Select a different account from the To account number dropdown
Click the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: The system processes the transaction for the minimum amount successfully

test_cases.title: Successful payment submission with all valid fields
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Send Payment page with a funded account available
steps: Enter 'John Doe' into the Payee Name field
Enter '123 Maple St' into the Address field
Enter 'Springfield' into the City field
Enter 'IL' into the State field
Enter '62704' into the Zip Code field
Enter '5551234567' into the Phone number field
Enter '987654321' into the Account number field
Enter '987654321' into the Verify Account number field
Enter '150.00' into the Amount field
Select the first available account from the From account number dropdown
Click the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: A confirmation message appears indicating the transfer was successful

test_cases.title: Error validation when required fields are left empty
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Send Payment page
steps: Leave all input fields empty
Click the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: Validation errors are displayed for all required fields and no confirmation message appears

test_cases.title: Error validation when Account Number and Verify Account Number do not match
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Send Payment page
steps: Enter 'John Doe' into the Payee Name field
Enter '123 Maple St' into the Address field
Enter 'Springfield' into the City field
Enter 'IL' into the State field
Enter '62704' into the Zip Code field
Enter '5551234567' into the Phone number field
Enter '12345' into the Account number field
Enter '54321' into the Verify Account number field
Enter '10.00' into the Amount field
Select an account from the From account number dropdown
Click the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the account numbers do not match

test_cases.title: Payment submission with special characters in Payee Name
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Send Payment page
steps: Enter 'O'Reilly-Smith & Co.' into the Payee Name field
Enter '123 Maple St' into the Address field
Enter 'Springfield' into the City field
Enter 'IL' into the State field
Enter '62704' into the Zip Code field
Enter '5551234567' into the Phone number field
Enter '987654321' into the Account number field
Enter '987654321' into the Verify Account number field
Enter '5.00' into the Amount field
Select an account from the From account number dropdown
Click the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: A confirmation message appears indicating the transfer was successful

test_cases.title: Verify Zip Code field accepts alphanumeric characters
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Send Payment page
steps: Enter 'Jane Doe' into the Payee Name field
Enter '456 Oak Ave' into the Address field
Enter 'Toronto' into the City field
Enter 'ON' into the State field
Enter 'M5H 2N2' into the Zip Code field
Enter '5559876543' into the Phone number field
Enter '112233' into the Account number field
Enter '112233' into the Verify Account number field
Enter '25.50' into the Amount field
Select an account from the From account number dropdown
Click the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: A confirmation message appears indicating the transfer was successful

test_cases.title: Search for transaction with valid Transaction ID
test_cases.preconditions: A transaction with ID 'TXN12345' exists for the selected account
steps: Select an account from the Account dropdown
Enter 'TXN12345' into the Transaction ID input field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table displays the matching transaction showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount

test_cases.title: Search for transactions with valid single date
test_cases.preconditions: The user is on the Find Transaction page with existing transaction data for the selected date
steps: Select an account from the Account dropdown
Enter a valid date in 'MM-DD-YYYY' format into the Find by Date field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table displays transactions matching the selected date with Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount columns

test_cases.title: Successful search by valid date range
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Find Transaction page with existing transactions in the system
steps: Select an account from the Account dropdown
Enter '01-01-2023' into the Start Date field
Enter '01-31-2023' into the End Date field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: A results table is displayed showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount for all transactions within the specified range.

test_cases.title: Search for transaction with valid amount and account
test_cases.preconditions: At least one transaction exists for the selected account with a specific amount
steps: Select a valid account from the 'Account' dropdown
Enter a valid numeric value in the 'Find by Amount' field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table displays matching transactions showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount

test_cases.title: Search for transaction with amount containing decimals
test_cases.preconditions: A transaction exists with a decimal value (e.g., 100.50)
steps: Select a valid account from the 'Account' dropdown
Enter a decimal value (e.g., '100.50') in the 'Find by Amount' field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table displays the transaction matching the exact decimal amount

test_cases.title: Validation error on empty required fields
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Find Transaction page
steps: Leave the Account, Start Date, and End Date fields empty
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation messages appear next to the Account, Start Date, and End Date fields indicating they are required.

test_cases.title: Search with single day date range
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Find Transaction page
steps: Select an account from the Account dropdown
Enter '05-15-2023' into the Start Date field
Enter '05-15-2023' into the End Date field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The system returns transactions that occurred specifically on 05-15-2023 in the results table.

test_cases.title: Search with empty Account field
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the Account dropdown unselected
Enter 'TXN12345' into the Transaction ID input field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Account field indicating it is required

test_cases.title: Search with empty Transaction ID field
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Select an account from the Account dropdown
Clear any text from the Transaction ID input field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Transaction ID field indicating it is required

test_cases.title: Search with empty Account field
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the Account dropdown unselected
Enter a valid date in 'MM-DD-YYYY' format into the Find by Date field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Account field indicating it is required

test_cases.title: Search with empty Date field
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Select an account from the Account dropdown
Leave the Find by Date field empty
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Find by Date field indicating it is required

test_cases.title: Search with invalid date format
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Select an account from the Account dropdown
Enter a date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format into the Find by Date field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Find by Date field indicating the format must be MM-DD-YYYY

test_cases.title: Search with non-numeric characters in date field
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Select an account from the Account dropdown
Enter 'AA-BB-CCCC' into the Find by Date field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Find by Date field indicating an invalid date format

test_cases.title: Validation error for invalid date format
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Find Transaction page
steps: Select an account from the Account dropdown
Enter '2023/01/01' into the Start Date field
Enter '2023/01/31' into the End Date field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation messages appear next to the date fields indicating the required MM-DD-YYYY format.

test_cases.title: Validation error for non-numeric date characters
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Find Transaction page
steps: Select an account from the Account dropdown
Enter 'Jan-01-2023' into the Start Date field
Enter 'Jan-31-2023' into the End Date field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation messages appear next to the date fields indicating the input is invalid.

test_cases.title: Validation error when Account is not selected
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the 'Account' dropdown unselected or at its default empty state
Enter a valid numeric value in the 'Find by Amount' field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Account field indicating it is required

test_cases.title: Validation error when Amount field is empty
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Select a valid account from the 'Account' dropdown
Leave the 'Find by Amount' field empty
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Find by Amount field indicating it is required

test_cases.title: Validation error for non-numeric input in Amount field
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Select a valid account from the 'Account' dropdown
Enter non-numeric characters (e.g., 'abc') in the 'Find by Amount' field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Find by Amount field indicating invalid input

test_cases.title: Search with non-existent Transaction ID
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Select an account from the Account dropdown
Enter 'NON_EXISTENT_999' into the Transaction ID input field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table is empty or displays a message indicating no transactions were found

test_cases.title: Search with Transaction ID containing special characters
test_cases.preconditions: A transaction with ID 'TXN-@#$123' exists for the selected account
steps: Select an account from the Account dropdown
Enter 'TXN-@#$123' into the Transaction ID input field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table displays the matching transaction with the special character ID

test_cases.title: Search for a date with no matching transactions
test_cases.preconditions: The user is on the Find Transaction page and selects a date known to have no transaction history
steps: Select an account from the Account dropdown
Enter a valid date in 'MM-DD-YYYY' format that has no records
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table is empty or displays a message indicating no transactions were found for the selected date

test_cases.title: Search with date range containing no transactions
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Find Transaction page
steps: Select an account from the Account dropdown
Enter '01-01-1900' into the Start Date field
Enter '01-01-1901' into the End Date field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The system indicates that no transactions were found for the selected criteria (e.g., an empty table or a 'no results' message).

test_cases.title: Search with leap year date
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Find Transaction page
steps: Select an account from the Account dropdown
Enter '02-29-2024' into the Start Date field
Enter '02-29-2024' into the End Date field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The system accepts the valid leap year date and returns matching transactions in the results table.

test_cases.title: Search for an amount that has no matching transactions
test_cases.preconditions: No transactions exist for the selected account with the amount '999999.99'
steps: Select a valid account from the 'Account' dropdown
Enter '999999.99' in the 'Find by Amount' field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The system indicates no matching transactions were found, and the results table remains empty or hidden

test_cases.title: Search using a zero amount
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Select a valid account from the 'Account' dropdown
Enter '0' in the 'Find by Amount' field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The system processes the request and either returns matching $0.00 transactions or shows no results if none exist

test_cases.title: Update profile with all valid fields
test_cases.preconditions: The Update Profile page is loaded with existing user data
steps: Enter 'John' into the First Name field
Enter 'Doe' into the Last Name field
Enter '123 Maple Street' into the Address field
Enter 'Springfield' into the City field
Enter 'Illinois' into the State field
Enter '62704' into the Zip Code field
Enter '555-0199' into the Phone number field
Click the Update Profile button
test_cases.expected_result: A confirmation message is displayed indicating the profile was successfully updated

test_cases.title: Submit form with empty First Name
test_cases.preconditions: The Update Profile page is loaded
steps: Clear the First Name field
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the Update Profile button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that First Name is required

test_cases.title: Submit form with empty Last Name
test_cases.preconditions: The Update Profile page is loaded
steps: Clear the Last Name field
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the Update Profile button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that Last Name is required

test_cases.title: Submit form with empty Address
test_cases.preconditions: The Update Profile page is loaded
steps: Clear the Address field
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the Update Profile button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that Address is required

test_cases.title: Submit form with empty City
test_cases.preconditions: The Update Profile page is loaded
steps: Clear the City field
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the Update Profile button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that City is required

test_cases.title: Submit form with empty State
test_cases.preconditions: The Update Profile page is loaded
steps: Clear the State field
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the Update Profile button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that State is required

test_cases.title: Submit form with empty Zip Code
test_cases.preconditions: The Update Profile page is loaded
steps: Clear the Zip Code field
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the Update Profile button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that Zip Code is required

test_cases.title: Submit form with empty Phone number
test_cases.preconditions: The Update Profile page is loaded
steps: Clear the Phone number field
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the Update Profile button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that Phone number is required

test_cases.title: Update profile using special characters in Name fields
test_cases.preconditions: The Update Profile page is loaded
steps: Enter 'Jean-Luc' into the First Name field
Enter 'O'Reilly' into the Last Name field
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the Update Profile button
test_cases.expected_result: A confirmation message is displayed indicating the profile was successfully updated

test_cases.title: Update profile with alphanumeric Zip Code
test_cases.preconditions: The Update Profile page is loaded
steps: Enter 'K1A 0B1' into the Zip Code field
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the Update Profile button
test_cases.expected_result: A confirmation message is displayed indicating the profile was successfully updated

test_cases.title: Successful loan application with all valid fields
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Request Loan page with a valid account available
steps: Enter a valid numeric value in the Loan Amount field
Enter a valid numeric value in the Down Payment field
Select a valid account from the From account number dropdown
Click the Apply Now button
test_cases.expected_result: The loan application is approved and a success message is displayed

test_cases.title: Loan application fails when Loan Amount is blank
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Request Loan page
steps: Leave the Loan Amount field empty
Enter a valid numeric value in the Down Payment field
Select a valid account from the From account number dropdown
Click the Apply Now button
test_cases.expected_result: The process is not completed and a validation error for Loan Amount is displayed

test_cases.title: Loan application fails when Down Payment is blank
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Request Loan page
steps: Enter a valid numeric value in the Loan Amount field
Leave the Down Payment field empty
Select a valid account from the From account number dropdown
Click the Apply Now button
test_cases.expected_result: The process is not completed and a validation error for Down Payment is displayed

test_cases.title: Loan application fails when From account number is not selected
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Request Loan page
steps: Enter a valid numeric value in the Loan Amount field
Enter a valid numeric value in the Down Payment field
Ensure no account is selected in the From account number dropdown
Click the Apply Now button
test_cases.expected_result: The process is not completed and a validation error for account selection is displayed

test_cases.title: Loan application with zero down payment
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Request Loan page
steps: Enter a valid numeric value in the Loan Amount field
Enter '0' in the Down Payment field
Select a valid account from the From account number dropdown
Click the Apply Now button
test_cases.expected_result: The application is processed based on the business rules for zero down payment

test_cases.title: Loan application with minimum valid loan amount
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Request Loan page
steps: Enter '1' in the Loan Amount field
Enter '1' in the Down Payment field
Select a valid account from the From account number dropdown
Click the Apply Now button
test_cases.expected_result: The application is processed successfully for the minimum amount

test_cases.title: Successful logout from the application
test_cases.preconditions: User is currently logged into the application and viewing a page with the logout function available
steps: Click on the logout button/link
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the login page and the session is terminated.

test_cases.title: Verify session invalidation after logout
test_cases.preconditions: User has successfully clicked the logout button and is on the login page
steps: Click the browser's 'Back' button to attempt to return to the previous authenticated page
test_cases.expected_result: The user is prevented from viewing authenticated content and is redirected back to the login page or shown an unauthorized message.

test_cases.title: Verify removal of sensitive account data from the UI
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and account-specific information (e.g., username, profile pic) is visible
steps: Click on the logout button/link
Observe the resulting login page for any cached user-specific data
test_cases.expected_result: The login page loads without displaying any previous account information, usernames, or sensitive session data.

test_cases.title: Verify logout functionality across multiple open tabs
test_cases.preconditions: User has the application open in two different browser tabs and is logged in
steps: Click the logout button in Tab 1
Switch to Tab 2
Refresh the page in Tab 2
test_cases.expected_result: Tab 2 redirects the user to the login page, confirming the session was cleared globally.
